trans-unit.source: Represents text that should be kept confidential, such as by deleting it from computer memory when no longer needed.
trans-unit.target: 代表應該將文字保密，例如於不再使用時將它從電腦記憶體刪除。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.SecureString> is a string type that provides a measure of security.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.SecureString> 是提供量值的字串類型。

trans-unit.source: It tries to avoid storing potentially sensitive strings in process memory as plain text.
trans-unit.target: 它會嘗試避免以純文字格式的程序記憶體中儲存敏感性字串。

trans-unit.source: (For limitations, however, see the [How secure is SecureString?](#HowSecure) section.) The value of an instance of <xref:System.Security.SecureString> is automatically protected using a mechanism supported by the underlying platform when the instance is initialized or when the value is modified.
trans-unit.target: (如限制，不過，請參閱[安全是 SecureString？](#HowSecure) > 一節。)執行個體的值<xref:System.Security.SecureString>自動保護使用執行個體初始化或修改值時，基礎平台所支援的機制。

trans-unit.source: Your application can render the instance immutable and prevent further modification by invoking the <xref:System.Security.SecureString.MakeReadOnly%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您的應用程式可以呈現執行個體的不可變，並避免其他修改叫用<xref:System.Security.SecureString.MakeReadOnly%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The maximum length of a <xref:System.Security.SecureString> instance is 65,536 characters.
trans-unit.target: 最大長度<xref:System.Security.SecureString>執行個體為 65,536 個字元。

trans-unit.source: This type implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此類型會實作<xref:System.IDisposable>介面。

trans-unit.source: When you have finished using an instance of the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly.
trans-unit.target: 當您完成使用類型的執行個體時，您應該會處置它直接或間接。

trans-unit.source: To dispose of the type directly, call its <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> method in a `try`/`catch` block.
trans-unit.target: 若要直接處置的類型，呼叫其<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>方法中的`try` / `catch`區塊。

trans-unit.source: To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 若要為其配置間接，使用語言建構例如`using`（C# 中） 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface topic.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 「 使用物件的實作 IDisposable 」 一節<xref:System.IDisposable>介面 > 主題。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.SecureString> class and its members are not visible to COM.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.SecureString>類別和其成員不是為 COM 可見。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComVisibleAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComVisibleAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: In this section:
trans-unit.target: 本節內容：

trans-unit.source: [String vs. SecureString](#vsString)
trans-unit.target: [字串與SecureString](#vsString)

trans-unit.source: [SecureString operations](#Ops)
trans-unit.target: [SecureString 作業](#Ops)

trans-unit.source: [SecureString and interop](#interop)
trans-unit.target: [SecureString 和 interop](#interop)

trans-unit.source: [How secure is SecureString?](#HowSecure)
trans-unit.target: [如何安全是 SecureString？](#HowSecure)

trans-unit.source: String versus SecureString
trans-unit.target: SecureString 與字串

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref:System.String?displayProperty=nameWithType> class is both immutable and, when no longer needed, cannot be programmatically scheduled for garbage collection; that is, the instance is read-only after it is created, and it is not possible to predict when the instance will be deleted from computer memory.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體<xref:System.String?displayProperty=nameWithType>類別會是不變，而且不再需要時，無法以程式設計方式排定進行記憶體回收; 亦即，執行個體是唯讀而建立，並不是預測這些執行個體時將之後從電腦記憶體刪除。

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.String?displayProperty=nameWithType> instances are immutable, operations that appear to modify an existing instance actually create a copy of it to manipulate.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.String?displayProperty=nameWithType>執行個體是不變，看似修改現有的執行個體的作業實際建立一份來操作。

trans-unit.source: Consequently, if a <xref:System.String> object contains sensitive information such as a password, credit card number, or personal data, there is a risk the information could be revealed after it is used because your application cannot delete the data from computer memory.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果<xref:System.String>物件包含密碼、 信用卡號碼或個人資料等機密資訊，會有的風險，因為您的應用程式無法從電腦記憶體刪除資料使用之後，可能會洩漏資訊.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.SecureString> object is similar to a <xref:System.String> object in that it has a text value.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Security.SecureString>物件是類似於<xref:System.String>物件，因為它具有文字值。

trans-unit.source: However, the value of a <xref:System.Security.SecureString> object is pinned in memory, may use a protection mechanism, such as encryption, provided by the underlying operating system, can be modified until your application marks it as read-only, and can be deleted from computer memory either by your application calling the <xref:System.Security.SecureString.Dispose%2A> method or by the .NET Framework garbage collector.
trans-unit.target: 不過，值<xref:System.Security.SecureString>物件已釘選在記憶體中，可能會使用保護機制，可以修改基礎作業系統所提供的加密，您的應用程式將它標記為唯讀，直到等，而且可以從電腦記憶體刪除由應用程式呼叫<xref:System.Security.SecureString.Dispose%2A>方法或.NET Framework 記憶體回收行程。

trans-unit.source: For a discussion of the limitations of the <xref:System.Security.SecureString> class, see the [How secure is SecureString?](#HowSecure) section.
trans-unit.target: 如需限制的討論<xref:System.Security.SecureString>類別，請參閱[安全是 SecureString？](#HowSecure) > 一節。

trans-unit.source: [Back to top](#top)
trans-unit.target: [回到頁首](#top)

trans-unit.source: SecureString operations
trans-unit.target: SecureString 作業

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.SecureString> class includes members that allow you to do the following:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.SecureString>類別包含成員，可讓您執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Instantiate a <xref:System.Security.SecureString> object
trans-unit.target: 具現化<xref:System.Security.SecureString>物件

trans-unit.source: You instantiate a <xref:System.Security.SecureString> object by calling its parameterless constructor.
trans-unit.target: 您具現化<xref:System.Security.SecureString>藉由呼叫其無參數建構函式的物件。

trans-unit.source: Add characters to a <xref:System.Security.SecureString> object
trans-unit.target: 加入字元<xref:System.Security.SecureString>物件

trans-unit.source: You can add a single character at a time to a <xref:System.Security.SecureString> object by calling its <xref:System.Security.SecureString.AppendChar%2A> or <xref:System.Security.SecureString.InsertAt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以加入一次的單一字元<xref:System.Security.SecureString>物件藉由呼叫其<xref:System.Security.SecureString.AppendChar%2A>或<xref:System.Security.SecureString.InsertAt%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.SecureString> object should never be constructed from a <xref:System.String>, because the sensitive data is already subject to the memory persistence consequences of the immutable <xref:System.String> class.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Security.SecureString>物件永遠不應該從建構<xref:System.String>，因為機密資料已經受限於記憶體持續性的後果不可變<xref:System.String>類別。

trans-unit.source: The best way to construct a <xref:System.Security.SecureString> object is from a character-at-a-time unmanaged source, such as the <xref:System.Console.ReadKey%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要建構，最好<xref:System.Security.SecureString>物件是從字元-一次 unmanaged 的來源，例如<xref:System.Console.ReadKey%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: Remove characters from a <xref:System.Security.SecureString> object
trans-unit.target: 移除字元<xref:System.Security.SecureString>物件

trans-unit.source: You can replace an individual character by calling the <xref:System.Security.SecureString.SetAt%2A> method, remove an individual character by calling the <xref:System.Security.SecureString.RemoveAt%2A> method, or remove all characters from the <xref:System.Security.SecureString> instance by calling the <xref:System.Security.SecureString.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由呼叫來取代個別字元<xref:System.Security.SecureString.SetAt%2A>方法，藉由呼叫移除個別字元<xref:System.Security.SecureString.RemoveAt%2A>方法或移除所有字元從<xref:System.Security.SecureString>藉由呼叫的執行個體<xref:System.Security.SecureString.Clear%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Make the <xref:System.Security.SecureString> object read-only
trans-unit.target: 請<xref:System.Security.SecureString>物件唯讀狀態

trans-unit.source: Once you have defined the string that the <xref:System.Security.SecureString> object represents, you call its <xref:System.Security.SecureString.MakeReadOnly%2A> method to make the string read-only.
trans-unit.target: 一旦您已定義的字串，<xref:System.Security.SecureString>物件表示，您呼叫其<xref:System.Security.SecureString.MakeReadOnly%2A>方法，以讓唯讀的字串。

trans-unit.source: Get information about the <xref:System.Security.SecureString> object
trans-unit.target: 取得相關資訊<xref:System.Security.SecureString>物件

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.SecureString> class has only two members that provide information about the string: its <xref:System.Security.SecureString.Length%2A> property, which indicates the number of UTF16-encoded code units in the string; and the <xref:System.Security.SecureString.IsReadOnly%2A>, method, which indicates whether the instance is read-only.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.SecureString>類別具有可提供字串的相關資訊的只有兩個成員： 其<xref:System.Security.SecureString.Length%2A>屬性，指出 UTF16 編碼字碼單位的字串; 字串數目而<xref:System.Security.SecureString.IsReadOnly%2A>，方法，指出執行個體唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: Release the memory allocated to the <xref:System.Security.SecureString> instance
trans-unit.target: 釋出配置給記憶體<xref:System.Security.SecureString>執行個體

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Security.SecureString> implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface, you release its memory by calling the <xref:System.Security.SecureString.Dispose%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Security.SecureString>實作<xref:System.IDisposable>介面，您藉由呼叫釋放其記憶體<xref:System.Security.SecureString.Dispose%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.SecureString> class has no members that inspect, compare, or convert the value of a <xref:System.Security.SecureString>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.SecureString>類別具有檢查、 比較或轉換的值沒有成員<xref:System.Security.SecureString>。

trans-unit.source: The absence of such members helps protect the value of the instance from accidental or malicious exposure.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有這類成員可協助防止意外或惡意公開的執行個體的值。

trans-unit.source: Use appropriate members of the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal?displayProperty=nameWithType> class, such as the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.SecureStringToBSTR%2A> method, to manipulate the value of a <xref:System.Security.SecureString> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用的適當成員<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal?displayProperty=nameWithType>類別，例如<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.SecureStringToBSTR%2A>方法，來操作的值<xref:System.Security.SecureString>物件。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework Class Library commonly uses <xref:System.Security.SecureString> instances in the following ways:
trans-unit.target: 通常會使用.NET Framework 類別庫<xref:System.Security.SecureString>執行個體，以下列方式：

trans-unit.source: To provide password information to a process by using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo> structure or by calling an overload of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method that has a parameter of type <xref:System.Security.SecureString>.
trans-unit.target: 若要透過使用提供的密碼資訊至處理序<xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo>結構，或藉由呼叫的多載<xref:System.Diagnostics.Process.Start%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>參數類型的方法<xref:System.Security.SecureString>。

trans-unit.source: To provide network password information by calling a <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential> class constructor that has a parameter of type <xref:System.Security.SecureString> or by using the <xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential.SecurePassword%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 藉由呼叫提供網路密碼資訊<xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential>類別建構函式具有類型的參數<xref:System.Security.SecureString>或使用<xref:System.Net.NetworkCredential.SecurePassword%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To provide password information for SQL Server Authentication by calling the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCredential.%23ctor%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> constructor or retrieving the value of the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCredential.Password%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 藉由呼叫提供 SQL Server 驗證的密碼資訊<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCredential.%23ctor%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>建構函式或擷取的值<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCredential.Password%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To pass a string to unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 若要將字串傳遞至 unmanaged 程式碼。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [SecureString and interop](#interop) section.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[SecureString 和 interop](#interop) > 一節。

trans-unit.source: [Back to top](#top)
trans-unit.target: [回到頁首](#top)

trans-unit.source: SecureString and interop
trans-unit.target: SecureString 和 interop

trans-unit.source: Because the operating system does not directly support <xref:System.Security.SecureString>, you must convert the value of the <xref:System.Security.SecureString> object to the required string type before passing the string to a native method.
trans-unit.target: 因為作業系統並不直接支援<xref:System.Security.SecureString>，您必須將轉換的值<xref:System.Security.SecureString>成必要的字串類型，再將字串傳遞至原生方法的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal> class has five methods that do this:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal>類別有五種執行這項操作的方法：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.SecureStringToBSTR%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, which converts the <xref:System.Security.SecureString> string value to a binary string (BSTR) recognized by COM.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.SecureStringToBSTR%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>將<xref:System.Security.SecureString>字串到 COM 所辨識的二進位字串 (BSTR) 的值

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.SecureStringToCoTaskMemAnsi%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.SecureStringToGlobalAllocAnsi%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, which copy the <xref:System.Security.SecureString> string value to an ANSI string in unmanaged memory.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.SecureStringToCoTaskMemAnsi%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 和<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.SecureStringToGlobalAllocAnsi%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，複製<xref:System.Security.SecureString>字串 unmanaged 記憶體中為 ANSI 字串值。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.SecureStringToCoTaskMemUnicode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.SecureStringToCoTaskMemUnicode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, which copy the <xref:System.Security.SecureString> string value to a Unicode string in unmanaged memory.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.SecureStringToCoTaskMemUnicode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 和<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.SecureStringToCoTaskMemUnicode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，複製<xref:System.Security.SecureString>字串到 unmanaged 記憶體中的 Unicode 字串值。

trans-unit.source: Each of these methods creates a clear-text string in unmanaged memory.
trans-unit.target: 每一種方法在 unmanaged 記憶體中建立純文字字串。

trans-unit.source: It is the responsibility of the developer to zero out and free that memory as soon as it is no longer needed.
trans-unit.target: 它是開發人員會清空，並釋放該記憶體，只要不再需要的責任。

trans-unit.source: Each of the string conversion and memory allocation methods has a corresponding method to zero out and free the allocated memory:
trans-unit.target: 字串轉換和記憶體配置方法的每個已對應的方法將會清空，並釋放配置的記憶體：

trans-unit.source: Allocation and conversion method
trans-unit.target: 配置和轉換方法

trans-unit.source: Zero and free method
trans-unit.target: 零和 free 方法

trans-unit.source: [Back to top](#top)
trans-unit.target: [回到頁首](#top)

trans-unit.source: How secure is SecureString?
trans-unit.target: 如何安全是 SecureString？

trans-unit.source: When created properly, a <xref:System.Security.SecureString> instance provides more data protection than a <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 當建立正常運作，<xref:System.Security.SecureString>執行個體會提供更多的資料保護，比<xref:System.String>。

trans-unit.source: When creating a string from a character-at-a-time source, <xref:System.String> creates multiple intermediate in memory, whereas <xref:System.Security.SecureString> creates just a single instance.
trans-unit.target: 當建立字串字元-一次來源<xref:System.String>而會在記憶體中，建立多個中繼<xref:System.Security.SecureString>建立只要單一執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Garbage collection of <xref:System.String> objects is non-deterministic.
trans-unit.target: 記憶體回收<xref:System.String>物件不具決定性。

trans-unit.source: In addition, because its memory is not pinned, the garbage collector will make additional copies of <xref:System.String> values when moving and compacting memory.
trans-unit.target: 此外，因為其記憶體無法釘選，記憶體回收行程將會產生多份<xref:System.String>值時移動和壓縮記憶體。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, the memory allocated to a <xref:System.Security.SecureString> object is pinned, and that memory can be freed by calling the <xref:System.Security.SecureString.Dispose%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，若要配置的記憶體<xref:System.Security.SecureString>物件已釘選，而且可以釋放該記憶體，藉由呼叫<xref:System.Security.SecureString.Dispose%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Although data stored in a <xref:System.Security.SecureString> instance is more secure than data stored in a <xref:System.String> instance, there are significant limitations on how secure a <xref:System.Security.SecureString> instance is.
trans-unit.target: 雖然資料儲存在<xref:System.Security.SecureString>執行個體是比儲存在資料安全<xref:System.String>執行個體，有安全上的重要限制<xref:System.Security.SecureString>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: These include:
trans-unit.target: 它們包括：

trans-unit.source: Platform
trans-unit.target: 平台

trans-unit.source: On the Windows operating system, the contents of a <xref:System.Security.SecureString> instance's internal character array is encrypted.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows 作業系統的內容上<xref:System.Security.SecureString>加密執行個體的內部字元陣列。

trans-unit.source: However, whether because of missing APIs or key management issues, encryption is not available on all platforms.
trans-unit.target: 不過，是否因為遺漏應用程式開發介面或金鑰管理問題，加密並不適用於所有平台。

trans-unit.source: Because of this, <xref:System.Security.SecureString> is available on Desktop (Windows only), and not on .NET Core.
trans-unit.target: 因為這個緣故，<xref:System.Security.SecureString>可在桌面上 (僅限 Windows)，而不是在.NET Core。

trans-unit.source: Duration
trans-unit.target: 持續期間

trans-unit.source: Even if the <xref:System.Security.SecureString> implementation is able to take advantage of encryption, the plain text assigned to the <xref:System.Security.SecureString> instance may be exposed at various times:
trans-unit.target: 即使<xref:System.Security.SecureString>實作是能夠利用加密、 純文字指派給<xref:System.Security.SecureString>執行個體可能會暴露在不同時間：

trans-unit.source: Because Windows doesn't offer a secure string implementation at the operating system level, the .NET Framework still has to convert the secure string value to its plain text representation in order to use it.
trans-unit.target: Windows 並未提供作業系統層級的安全字串實作，因為.NET Framework 仍然必須將安全字串值轉換成其純文字表示法，才能使用它。

trans-unit.source: Whenever the value of the secure string is modified by methods such as <xref:System.Security.SecureString.AppendChar%2A> or <xref:System.Security.SecureString.RemoveAt%2A>, it must be decrypted (i.e., converted back to plain text), modified, and then encrypted again.
trans-unit.target: 只要安全字串的值修改方法例如<xref:System.Security.SecureString.AppendChar%2A>或<xref:System.Security.SecureString.RemoveAt%2A>，必須解密 （亦即，已轉換的回純文字）、 加以修改，因此再加密一次。

trans-unit.source: If the secure string is used in an interop call, it must be converted to an ANSI string, a Unicode string, or a binary string (BSTR).
trans-unit.target: 如果 interop 呼叫中使用的安全字串，它必須轉換為 ANSI 字串、 Unicode 字串，或二進位字串 (BSTR)。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [SecureString and interop](#interop) section.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[SecureString 和 interop](#interop) > 一節。

trans-unit.source: The time interval for which the <xref:System.Security.SecureString> instance's value is exposed is merely shortened in comparison to the <xref:System.String> class.
trans-unit.target: 時間間隔<xref:System.Security.SecureString>公開執行個體的值只會於縮短<xref:System.String>類別。

trans-unit.source: Storage versus usage
trans-unit.target: 儲存體與使用方式

trans-unit.source: More generally, the <xref:System.Security.SecureString> class defines a storage mechanism for string values that should be protected or kept confidential.
trans-unit.target: 較常見地，<xref:System.Security.SecureString>類別定義的字串值應該保持機密或受保護的儲存機制。

trans-unit.source: However, outside of the .NET Framework itself, no usage mechanism supports <xref:System.Security.SecureString>.
trans-unit.target: 不過，.NET Framework 本身以外沒有使用量機制支援<xref:System.Security.SecureString>。

trans-unit.source: This means that the secure string must be converted to a usable form (typically a clear text form) that can be recognized by its target, and that decryption and conversion must occur in user space.
trans-unit.target: 這表示安全字串，必須轉換成可用的格式 （通常是純文字形式），其目標，可以辨識和解密和轉換必須出現在使用者空間中。

trans-unit.source: Overall, <xref:System.Security.SecureString> is more secure than <xref:System.String> because it limits the exposure of sensitive string data.
trans-unit.target: 整體而言，<xref:System.Security.SecureString>比更安全<xref:System.String>因為它會限制公開敏感的字串資料。

trans-unit.source: However, those strings may still be exposed to any process or operation that has access to raw memory, such as a malicious process running on the host computer, a process dump, or a user-viewable swap file.
trans-unit.target: 不過，這些字串可能仍然會公開給任何處理程序或具有未經處理的記憶體，例如主機電腦、 處理序傾印或使用者可檢視交換檔上執行的惡意程序的存取權的作業。

trans-unit.source: Instead of using <xref:System.Security.SecureString> to protect passwords, the recommended alternative is to use an opaque handle to credentials that are stored outside of the process.
trans-unit.target: 而不是使用<xref:System.Security.SecureString>若要保護的密碼，建議的替代做法是使用儲存認證時，在程序之外的不透明控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: [Back to top](#top)
trans-unit.target: [回到頁首](#top)

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use a <xref:System.Security.SecureString> to secure a user’s password for use as a credential to start a new process.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Security.SecureString>來保護認證以啟動新的處理程序作為使用者的密碼。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.SecureString" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.SecureString" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.SecureString" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.SecureString" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the default (or parameterless) constructor to instantiate a new <xref:System.Security.SecureString> object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用預設值 （或無參數） 建構函式來具現化新<xref:System.Security.SecureString>物件。

trans-unit.source: It then calls the <xref:System.Security.SecureString.AppendChar%2A> method to add an array of characters to it.
trans-unit.target: 然後它會呼叫<xref:System.Security.SecureString.AppendChar%2A>方法可新增為字元陣列。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Security.SecureString> object from the value of a <xref:System.String> object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Security.SecureString>物件的值從<xref:System.String>物件。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while protecting or unprotecting the value of this instance.
trans-unit.target: 保護或解除保護這個執行個體的值時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: This operation is not supported on this platform.
trans-unit.target: 這個平台上不支援這項作業。

trans-unit.source: A pointer to an array of <see cref="T:System.Char" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Char" /> 物件陣列的指標。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements of <c>value</c> to include in the new instance.
trans-unit.target: 要包含在新執行個體中之 <c>value</c> 的項目數。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.SecureString" /> class from a subarray of <see cref="T:System.Char" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Char" /> 物件的子陣列，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.SecureString" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is not CLS-compliant.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式不符合 CLS 標準。

trans-unit.source: The CLS-compliant alternative is <see cref="M:System.Security.SecureString.#ctor" />.
trans-unit.target: 符合 CLS 標準的替代項目為 <see cref="M:System.Security.SecureString.#ctor" />。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the new <xref:System.Security.SecureString> object to the number of characters in `value` specified by `length`; the value of the instance is then encrypted.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會初始化新<xref:System.Security.SecureString>物件中的字元數`value`所指定`length`; 執行個體的值會加密。

trans-unit.source: In C#, this constructor is defined only in the context of unsafe code.
trans-unit.target: 在 C# 中，只在不安全的程式碼內容中定義這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The following example instantiates a new <xref:System.Security.SecureString> object by passing its constructor a pointer to a character array.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會具現化新<xref:System.Security.SecureString>物件透過其建構函式指標傳遞至字元陣列。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="length" /> is less than zero or greater than 65,536.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="length" /> 小於零或大於 65,536。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while protecting or unprotecting the value of this secure string.
trans-unit.target: 保護或解除保護這個安全字串的值時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: This operation is not supported on this platform.
trans-unit.target: 這個平台上不支援這項作業。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: A character to append to this secure string.
trans-unit.target: 附加至這個安全字串的字元。

trans-unit.source: Appends a character to the end of the current secure string.
trans-unit.target: 將字元附加至目前安全字串的結尾。

trans-unit.source: If the implementation uses a protection mechanism, such as encryption, the value of this secure string, if any, is unprotected; `c` is appended; then the new value of the secure string is re-protected.
trans-unit.target: 如果實作會使用保護機制，例如加密，如果有的話，這個安全字串的值是未受保護;`c`附加; 然後安全字串的新值並在重新保護。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how the <xref:System.Security.SecureString.AppendChar%2A>, <xref:System.Security.SecureString.InsertAt%2A>, <xref:System.Security.SecureString.RemoveAt%2A>, <xref:System.Security.SecureString.SetAt%2A>, and <xref:System.Security.SecureString.Clear%2A> methods affect the value of a <xref:System.Security.SecureString> object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何<xref:System.Security.SecureString.AppendChar%2A>， <xref:System.Security.SecureString.InsertAt%2A>， <xref:System.Security.SecureString.RemoveAt%2A>， <xref:System.Security.SecureString.SetAt%2A>，和<xref:System.Security.SecureString.Clear%2A>方法影響的值<xref:System.Security.SecureString>物件。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how the <xref:System.Security.SecureString.AppendChar%2A> and <xref:System.Security.SecureString.RemoveAt%2A> methods can be used to collect the characters in a password.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何<xref:System.Security.SecureString.AppendChar%2A>和<xref:System.Security.SecureString.RemoveAt%2A>方法可以用來收集密碼中的字元。

trans-unit.source: This secure string has already been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 這個安全字串已經過處置。

trans-unit.source: This secure string is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個安全字串是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: Performing this operation would make the length of this secure string greater than 65,536 characters.
trans-unit.target: 執行這項作業會使這個安全字串的長度大於 65,536 個字元。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while protecting or unprotecting the value of this secure string.
trans-unit.target: 保護或解除保護這個安全字串的值時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Deletes the value of the current secure string.
trans-unit.target: 刪除目前安全字串的值。

trans-unit.source: The computer memory that contains the value of this secure string is zeroed, then the length of the value of this secure string is set to zero.
trans-unit.target: 電腦記憶體，其中包含這個安全字串的值為 0，則這個安全字串的值的長度設定為零。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how the <xref:System.Security.SecureString.AppendChar%2A>, <xref:System.Security.SecureString.InsertAt%2A>, <xref:System.Security.SecureString.RemoveAt%2A>, <xref:System.Security.SecureString.SetAt%2A>, and <xref:System.Security.SecureString.Clear%2A> methods affect the value of a <xref:System.Security.SecureString> object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何<xref:System.Security.SecureString.AppendChar%2A>， <xref:System.Security.SecureString.InsertAt%2A>， <xref:System.Security.SecureString.RemoveAt%2A>， <xref:System.Security.SecureString.SetAt%2A>，和<xref:System.Security.SecureString.Clear%2A>方法影響的值<xref:System.Security.SecureString>物件。

trans-unit.source: This secure string has already been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 這個安全字串已經過處置。

trans-unit.source: This secure string is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個安全字串是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of the current secure string.
trans-unit.target: 建立目前安全字串的複本。

trans-unit.source: A duplicate of this secure string.
trans-unit.target: 這個安全字串的複本。

trans-unit.source: If an instance of a <xref:System.Security.SecureString> is marked read-only, the copy of that instance will not be read-only.
trans-unit.target: 如果執行個體<xref:System.Security.SecureString>是標示為唯讀，該執行個體的複本將不處於唯讀模式。

trans-unit.source: This secure string has already been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 這個安全字串已經過處置。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while protecting or unprotecting the value of this secure string.
trans-unit.target: 保護或解除保護這個安全字串的值時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the current <see cref="T:System.Security.SecureString" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 釋放由 <see cref="T:System.Security.SecureString" /> 物件使用的所有資源。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.SecureString.Dispose%2A> method writes binary zeroes to the allocated memory that contains the value of this <xref:System.Security.SecureString> object, then frees the allocated memory.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.SecureString.Dispose%2A>方法會寫入配置的記憶體，其中包含這個值的二進位零<xref:System.Security.SecureString>物件，然後釋放配置的記憶體。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Garbage Collection](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/22b6cb97-0c80-4eeb-a2cf-5ed7655e37f9).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[回收](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/22b6cb97-0c80-4eeb-a2cf-5ed7655e37f9)。

trans-unit.source: The index position where parameter <c>c</c> is inserted.
trans-unit.target: 插入參數 <c>c</c> 的索引位置。

trans-unit.source: The character to insert.
trans-unit.target: 要插入的字元。

trans-unit.source: Inserts a character in this secure string at the specified index position.
trans-unit.target: 將這個安全字串中的字元插入指定索引位置。

trans-unit.source: The index is zero-based; the first character in this secure string is at index position zero.
trans-unit.target: 索引以零為起始。這個安全字串中的第一個字元是在索引位置為零。

trans-unit.source: If the implementation uses a protection mechanism, such as encryption, the value of the secure string, if any, is unprotected; `c` is inserted at the specified index position; then the new value is re-protected.
trans-unit.target: 如果實作會使用保護機制，例如加密，如果有的話，安全字串的值是未受保護;`c`插入指定的索引位置，則新值並在重新保護。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.SecureString.InsertAt%2A> method yields the same results as the <xref:System.Security.SecureString.AppendChar%2A> method, which inserts a character at the end of a secure string, if the `index` parameter of <xref:System.Security.SecureString.InsertAt%2A> is set to the length of this instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.SecureString.InsertAt%2A>方法會產生相同的結果<xref:System.Security.SecureString.AppendChar%2A>方法，這個方法會將安全字串的結尾插入字元，如果`index`參數<xref:System.Security.SecureString.InsertAt%2A>設為這個執行個體的長度。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how the <xref:System.Security.SecureString.AppendChar%2A>, <xref:System.Security.SecureString.InsertAt%2A>, <xref:System.Security.SecureString.RemoveAt%2A>, <xref:System.Security.SecureString.SetAt%2A>, and <xref:System.Security.SecureString.Clear%2A> methods affect the value of a <xref:System.Security.SecureString> object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何<xref:System.Security.SecureString.AppendChar%2A>， <xref:System.Security.SecureString.InsertAt%2A>， <xref:System.Security.SecureString.RemoveAt%2A>， <xref:System.Security.SecureString.SetAt%2A>，和<xref:System.Security.SecureString.Clear%2A>方法影響的值<xref:System.Security.SecureString>物件。

trans-unit.source: This secure string has already been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 這個安全字串已經過處置。

trans-unit.source: This secure string is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個安全字串是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero, or greater than the length of this secure string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小於零，或大於這個安全字串的長度。

trans-unit.source: -or-
Performing this operation would make the length of this secure string greater than 65,536 characters.
trans-unit.target: 執行這項作業會使這個安全字串的長度大於 65,536 個字元。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while protecting or unprotecting the value of this secure string.
trans-unit.target: 保護或解除保護這個安全字串的值時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether this secure string is marked read-only.
trans-unit.target: 指示這個安全字串是否標示為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this secure string is marked read-only; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個安全字串標示為唯讀則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: After an instance of <xref:System.Security.SecureString> is marked read-only by the <xref:System.Security.SecureString.MakeReadOnly%2A> method, any attempt to modify the value of the instance throws an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體之後<xref:System.Security.SecureString>標示為唯讀，由<xref:System.Security.SecureString.MakeReadOnly%2A>方法，任何嘗試修改值的執行個體則會擲回<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.SecureString.IsReadOnly%2A> method to test whether a <xref:System.Security.SecureString> is read-only before attempting to modify it.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.SecureString.IsReadOnly%2A>方法來測試是否<xref:System.Security.SecureString>處於唯讀狀態，然後再嘗試進行修改。

trans-unit.source: This secure string has already been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 這個安全字串已經過處置。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of characters in the current secure string.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前安全字串中的字元數。

trans-unit.source: The number of <see cref="T:System.Char" /> objects in this secure string.
trans-unit.target: 這個安全字串中 <see cref="T:System.Char" /> 物件的數目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.SecureString.Length%2A> property returns the number of <xref:System.Char> objects in this instance, not the number of Unicode characters.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.SecureString.Length%2A>屬性傳回的數目<xref:System.Char>這個執行個體中的物件、 不是 Unicode 字元的數目。

trans-unit.source: A Unicode character might be represented by more than one <xref:System.Char> object.
trans-unit.target: Unicode 字元可能會表示由多個<xref:System.Char>物件。

trans-unit.source: The maximum length of a <xref:System.Security.SecureString> instance is 65,536 characters.
trans-unit.target: 最大長度<xref:System.Security.SecureString>執行個體為 65,536 個字元。

trans-unit.source: This secure string has already been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 這個安全字串已經過處置。

trans-unit.source: Makes the text value of this secure string read-only.
trans-unit.target: 使這個安全字串的文字值成為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: Initialize the text value of an instance of the <xref:System.Security.SecureString> class with the <xref:System.Security.SecureString.%23ctor%2A> constructors, and modify the value with the <xref:System.Security.SecureString.Clear%2A>, <xref:System.Security.SecureString.RemoveAt%2A>, <xref:System.Security.SecureString.SetAt%2A>, <xref:System.Security.SecureString.InsertAt%2A>, and <xref:System.Security.SecureString.AppendChar%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的執行個體的文字值<xref:System.Security.SecureString>類別<xref:System.Security.SecureString.%23ctor%2A>建構函式，並修改此值與<xref:System.Security.SecureString.Clear%2A>， <xref:System.Security.SecureString.RemoveAt%2A>， <xref:System.Security.SecureString.SetAt%2A>， <xref:System.Security.SecureString.InsertAt%2A>，和<xref:System.Security.SecureString.AppendChar%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: After you have made your final modifications, use the <xref:System.Security.SecureString.MakeReadOnly%2A> method to make the value of the instance immutable (read-only).
trans-unit.target: 在進行最後的修改之後，使用<xref:System.Security.SecureString.MakeReadOnly%2A>方法，以讓執行個體的值不可變 （唯讀）。

trans-unit.source: After the value is marked as read-only, any further attempt to modify it throws an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: 任何值標示為唯讀之後，進一步嘗試修改它會擲回<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。

trans-unit.source: The effect of invoking <xref:System.Security.SecureString.MakeReadOnly%2A> is permanent because the <xref:System.Security.SecureString> class provides no means to make the secure string modifiable again.
trans-unit.target: 叫用的效果<xref:System.Security.SecureString.MakeReadOnly%2A>是永久性因為<xref:System.Security.SecureString>類別會提供任何方法來執行安全字串，然後再次修改。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.SecureString.IsReadOnly%2A> method to test whether an instance of <xref:System.Security.SecureString> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.SecureString.IsReadOnly%2A>方法來測試執行個體是否<xref:System.Security.SecureString>處於唯讀狀態。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how the <xref:System.Security.SecureString.AppendChar%2A> and <xref:System.Security.SecureString.RemoveAt%2A> methods can be used to collect the characters in a password.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何<xref:System.Security.SecureString.AppendChar%2A>和<xref:System.Security.SecureString.RemoveAt%2A>方法可以用來收集密碼中的字元。

trans-unit.source: After the password is collected, it is made read-only.
trans-unit.target: 收集密碼之後，它會變成唯讀。

trans-unit.source: This secure string has already been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 這個安全字串已經過處置。

trans-unit.source: The index position of a character in this secure string.
trans-unit.target: 這個安全字串中字元的索引位置。

trans-unit.source: Removes the character at the specified index position from this secure string.
trans-unit.target: 從這個安全字串移除位在指定索引位置的字元。

trans-unit.source: The index is zero-based; the first character in this instance is at index position zero.
trans-unit.target: 索引以零為起始。這個執行個體中的第一個字元是在索引位置為零。

trans-unit.source: If the implementation uses a protection mechanism, such as encryption, the value of this secure string, if any, is unprotected; the character at the specified index position is removed; then the new value is re-protected.
trans-unit.target: 如果實作會使用保護機制，例如加密，如果有的話，這個安全字串的值是未受保護;已移除指定的索引位置處的字元;然後，新值並在重新保護。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how the <xref:System.Security.SecureString.AppendChar%2A>, <xref:System.Security.SecureString.InsertAt%2A>, <xref:System.Security.SecureString.RemoveAt%2A>, <xref:System.Security.SecureString.SetAt%2A>, and <xref:System.Security.SecureString.Clear%2A> methods affect the value of a <xref:System.Security.SecureString> object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何<xref:System.Security.SecureString.AppendChar%2A>， <xref:System.Security.SecureString.InsertAt%2A>， <xref:System.Security.SecureString.RemoveAt%2A>， <xref:System.Security.SecureString.SetAt%2A>，和<xref:System.Security.SecureString.Clear%2A>方法影響的值<xref:System.Security.SecureString>物件。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how the <xref:System.Security.SecureString.AppendChar%2A> and <xref:System.Security.SecureString.RemoveAt%2A> methods can be used to collect the characters in a password.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何<xref:System.Security.SecureString.AppendChar%2A>和<xref:System.Security.SecureString.RemoveAt%2A>方法可以用來收集密碼中的字元。

trans-unit.source: This secure string has already been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 這個安全字串已經過處置。

trans-unit.source: This secure string is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個安全字串是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero, or greater than or equal to the length of this secure string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小於零，或是大於或等於這個安全字串的長度。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while protecting or unprotecting the value of this secure string.
trans-unit.target: 保護或解除保護這個安全字串的值時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The index position of an existing character in this secure string
trans-unit.target: 這個安全字串中現有字元的索引位置。

trans-unit.source: A character that replaces the existing character.
trans-unit.target: 取代現有字元的字元。

trans-unit.source: Replaces the existing character at the specified index position with another character.
trans-unit.target: 使用另一個字元，取代位在指定索引位置的現有字元。

trans-unit.source: The index is zero-based; the first character in this instance is at index position zero.
trans-unit.target: 索引以零為起始。這個執行個體中的第一個字元是在索引位置為零。

trans-unit.source: If the implementation uses a protection mechanism, such as encryption, the value of the secure string, if any, is unprotected; `c` is assigned to the specified index position; then the new value is re-protected.
trans-unit.target: 如果實作會使用保護機制，例如加密，如果有的話，安全字串的值是未受保護;`c`指派給指定的索引位置，則新值並在重新保護。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how the <xref:System.Security.SecureString.AppendChar%2A>, <xref:System.Security.SecureString.InsertAt%2A>, <xref:System.Security.SecureString.RemoveAt%2A>, <xref:System.Security.SecureString.SetAt%2A>, and <xref:System.Security.SecureString.Clear%2A> methods affect the value of a <xref:System.Security.SecureString> object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何<xref:System.Security.SecureString.AppendChar%2A>， <xref:System.Security.SecureString.InsertAt%2A>， <xref:System.Security.SecureString.RemoveAt%2A>， <xref:System.Security.SecureString.SetAt%2A>，和<xref:System.Security.SecureString.Clear%2A>方法影響的值<xref:System.Security.SecureString>物件。

trans-unit.source: This secure string has already been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 這個安全字串已經過處置。

trans-unit.source: This secure string is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 這個安全字串是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero, or greater than or equal to the length of this secure string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小於零，或是大於或等於這個安全字串的長度。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while protecting or unprotecting the value of this secure string.
trans-unit.target: 保護或解除保護這個安全字串的值時發生錯誤。
